channel.title: Please help me
channel.description:
I have a server on the address bleuren.no-ip.org I myself can log into it, I have the 'Start server' button, it loads, then I can go onto my server.
But, I try to ping my server and it shows '--' Also, when I try to add it to server status page, it will say it's offline.
What am I doing wrong?
Thanks, GM Bleuren of Server Bleuren

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Brian1111 Brian1111
item.description:
@Brian1111 wrote:

It’s working now,
my internet is dyamic, so everytime I startup, Ihave to configure that in the no-ip CP.

Thanks though.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

shouldn’t u run runserver.bat and not ping the server?
just make sure ip is right…
u do everything to make it public?

Read full topic
